```{r setup, include=F}
library(ggplot2)
library(nudz.styles)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```
##
```{r}
scales::show_col(nudz_palette()(4))
```


## Discrete scales
```{r}
plt <- ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Species)) +
    geom_point(size = 4)
plt + scale_color_nudz()
```

```{r}
plt + scale_color_()
```

```{r}
plt + scale_color_nudz(reverse = TRUE, guide = "none")
```


## Continuous scales
```{r}
plt <- ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Sepal.Width)) + 
  geom_point()
plt + scale_color_nudz(discrete = FALSE)
```
